website_summaries.verdict: This portable set is especially suited for people with longer hair who want big curls/waves.
pros: Detachable cord and protective case ensure durability
cons: Some owner complaints about loose clips

website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option for those who want heated rollers without a top-shelf price.
pros: Comes with 10 rollers in two different sizes
Customers appreciate this compact set for traveling
Updated J-clip offers a tight hold on hair with less creasing
cons: These rollers don't get as hot as some other brands

customer_reviews.title: Light and effective
customer_reviews.text: Flexible case that is easy for travel. They heated up immediately. I didn’t think they were hot enough but rolled them anyways... they worked great! Probably much better than a curling iron for your hair and much better volume achieved with this product, when I compare the two methods.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Newnam

customer_reviews.title: I just received these hot rollers and I was super excited that they were to heat up in 90 ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received these hot rollers and I was super excited that they were to heat up in 90 seconds, however, I plugged them in and they never heated up. After fiddling with the cord, they finally heated up. I have to do this every single time I use them. I would return but unfortunately it's not a free return and I'll be damned if I donate any more money for these crappy rollers. Some advice, make sure when you purchase anything at Amazon you have an option for free returns as not to lose any more money on something clearly not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LeoLady

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these rollers. I let them heat up for way longer than 90 seconds... Maybe more like 10 minutes, i used every single roller and I left them in my hair for about 30 minutes, some were in for even 45 minutes. When I took them out I was really disappointed, nothing happened to my hair. I will be returning these. My hair curls really nice with a curling iron I was just hoping for the crockpot version For hair. “ set it and forget it “
customer_reviews.author: CHASE

customer_reviews.title: These are awful! The J clips don't crease your hair because they fall out
customer_reviews.text: I had owned the prior version of these rollers for about 10 years. I loved them. The only reason I ordered new was because the rollers themselves had started breaking and would get hung in my hair. The new rollers are awful, you literally spend all your time picking them up out of the sink or off the floor because as you get one in your hair and start rolling the other the first one falls to the floor. The J clips don't hold at all, it doesn't matter which way you put the J it just pops off the roller and the roller falls out. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Travel and office. Fits in tote and suitcase heats up quick
customer_reviews.author: M. Viviana Dupuy

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: I love these little rollers. My first set lasted me 8 yrs, hoping to get the same from this new set. Easy to use, heats up quickly, sets in curl takes about 10 min. or leave in until rollers are cool I roll up hair then do make up. I alternate between big and small rollers. I do use two sets of rollers. Hair stays soft and full of body all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: were it not the best set of electric curlers on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years, and because I use it every day, and don't always use it well (sometimes leave it plugged in all day), it eventually stops working. This is the third time I've bought this product, over many years, and I would not have kept buying it/using it, were it not the best set of electric curlers on the market. The curlers work as advertised, but the best thing about it is that it is small, and extremely portable. I hope Remington keeps making this product, and Amazon continues to sell it, because in several years, I'll be back to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You do get what you pay for!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about these is that by ordering them from Amazon I can return them easily. They heated up fine but they will not hold the hair and the pins are terrible. I've had several sets of electric rollers so I'm no novice. My full set is by Remington and works great. That's why I thought this travel size would be perfect for my trip. These have some kind of rubberized surface, does not hold nearly as well as the flocked rollers. The pins are straight, not curved, and do fly out of the roller. I know they are cheap. But I'd rather pay more and get a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Hot to handle
customer_reviews.text: For serious travelers the product weighs in at 1.25 pounds. Size for the "large" is 1". I found the area to hold the curlers too small and i kept fumbling because of the heat. Returned and ordering the babybliss 1.5" travel rollers in a similar case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product :(
customer_reviews.text: I recommend that you do not buy these. They don’t heat up well,they did not stay heated, the clips fall out, they are way too small for big bouncy curls (I have shoulder length hair) and they really didn’t even curl my hair. I’ll return tomorrow. Not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: partyof5

customer_reviews.title: Stopped getting hot
customer_reviews.text: They got hot a few times, but all of a sudden, 3 of the curlers would not heat up. Maybe those 3 elements are the bottom are not working? I am not sure, but it is really frustrating as these were the perfect size for traveling. They fit perfect in my overnight case. I would not recommend as some of the elements stopped working the curlers in those elements do not get hot and there are not enough curlers for 2 or 3 to stop working. I can't curl my entire head of hair now and have to use a curling iron to supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I don't burn my fingers. The clips hold (both sizes). Cute and compact to boot. Va-va-voom. I'm using hot rollers again. Some reviewers complained that the larger clips did not hold the larger rollers. I wonder whether or not they put the shorter, bent side of the clip against the scalp, the same way you're supposed to use bobby pins. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Offer a ONE size roller option!!
customer_reviews.text: You get two sizes of rollers, but if you only use one size then it takes more than 30 minutes to keep reusing the 5 rollers that work for you...heat, roll, remove, heat, roll, remove, etc. Hey male designers!!!!..listen to your wives, girlfriends, etc. offer all of one size roller. It would make this actually functional for travel. I do like not having a hard plastic case which is why I tried these. But for the time it takes to put curls in my hair I may as well just use a curling iron. I'd be done in half the time!
customer_reviews.author: Kalispell Cutie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well for me
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work well for me. I purchased these hoping to find a quicker way to curl my shoulder-length hair. Although the curlers did get hot enough to put curls in my hair, it took a long time to achieve because there were not enough curlers to cover my head so I would have to put the curlers in my hair, wait about 10 minutes, take them out, reheat and put them in the rest of my hair. I also did not like that the clips left creases- I had to go over my curls with a regular curling iron, defeating the purpose of this being a quicker option for me.
customer_reviews.author: Meg RTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, great for those with less hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is long and thin, so I don’t even need all the rolls in this set. They heat well, and I have had no problems with improperly warmed or melted elements. I read the instructions carefully after seeing that others had these problems, and that helped. These heat quickly, and five minutes is more than enough time to get these quite hot. No tangle issues with my experience, clips are easy to use, and so long as you remember to unplug, these could be just what you are looking for! The compact size is its best feature.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Reader

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Electrical failure first time plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged rollers in, big blue flash and sparks. Burning electrical smell. Tripped circuit breaker in the house. Very dangerous. Not recommended. All electrical products should have safety test and meet UL standards. Maybe poor quality control. Could have been a worse accident and caused a bad shock or fire. Do yourself a favor and select something different. Filed report with Consumer Product Safety Council report number 20160607-EBEA4-2147417999.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel rollers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these roller specifically for traveling and I'm very happy with the result. They are compact so fit comfortably into a small suitcase, they heat to a nice temperature and are easy to use and restore into the provided case. I liked them so much I purchased a second set for my sister and she loves them too. I recommend these hot rollers if you want convenience when you travel.
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Roller set for home or travel
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect rollers for travel. Small case, pockets for the clips so you don't lose them, a price you can't beat. I paid $5 more, but they are still worth it. They heat up quickly, rollers are not too hot to handle, but provide lots of curl. Pins hold securely and leave no marks. I ordered them for travel, but find I am using them daily. At this price may order another set for home. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Best Hot Rollers
customer_reviews.text: Best hot rollers I’ve ever owned. I have a lot of hair & thought no way these 10 rollers would work for all my hair. They don’t fall out when you move your head. Very secure with rolller pins. Don’t dint my hair. Gives full body to my straight fine hair. So small and easy to pack for my cruise or any travelers destination. I use regularly and donating my old hot rollers.
customer_reviews.author: E Pearce

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars, even though I had to send it back. I didn't realize that my thick brown hair needs more curlers to completely cover my head. However, it is a good product and heated up fast. I would follow the other girl who wrote about getting large rollers, so all of them are the bigger size. As well as the clamps she suggested. Great if you don't have long thick hair. I even thought about taking 6-8 inches off my hair to make it work. But ultimately, I kept my hair and sent these great rollers back.
customer_reviews.author: aunt emma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, perfect, perfect rollers
customer_reviews.text: These are the best rollers I have ever used. They never get too hot to handle and the packaging is just the right size. I actually use them every day and my hair gets compliments when I never did before. I highly recommend this, but if they could make the cord retractable into the base and have better clips (I purchase the Conair Hot Roller Super Clips separately, which are great too), then this product would be absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: The clips are horrible and fall out!!
customer_reviews.text: I had these rollers for years, so when they got old, I bought a new set. The rollers are great and heat up fast. The only problem, and it's huge, is that the roller clips are a weird shape and literally pop off after you put them in!! HORRIBLE DESIGN. The old ones worked perfectly, I can't imagine why they changed the design. I have thin hair, so it's not that there is too much hair...they are just horribly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a travel hot roller set and convenient
customer_reviews.text: My first 2 times I used them they were not hot enough. I heated them for 5 minutes then were very hot, almost too hot to handle, but curled my hair. Would probably work better on shorter hair mine is past my shoulders but gives me a little more of a finished look to my hair on the bottom 3". They cool fairly fast to pack up quickly, easy to fit into any travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Hunting Gear Products

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - waste of money. They do not heat up
customer_reviews.text: They are nice and compact. Not sure why drying power is a choice on the review. They are not meant for drying. Curling power and heating power should be a choice. They do not heat up. I didn’t use them for a while after I bought them; I should’ve tried them even thought I didn’t need them right away, as now it’s too late to return them. They are garbage. They do not curl. Do not buy - waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Purchased primarily for travel but use pretty much every day. I did have to purchase additional rollers from Remington but was easy to do and expensive. They Don’t get too hot and provide good hold. Would definitely purchase again. Just took on a trip and was very pleased - easy to pack (small) and do a great job. First time in years I left my curling iron at home
customer_reviews.author: gingerky

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in the UK
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day in the U.S. However, I needed to take some on a trip to the U.K. and wondered if it really did automatically convert to the U.K. voltage without having to flip a switch, and it did! I only had to buy a UK plug converter, but no voltage converter was needed. They work exactly in the U.K. as they do in the U.S. I highly recommend this small pack for traveling. You won't find a smaller set that travels internationally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, these curl hair very nicely!
customer_reviews.text: I used these Remington hot rollers on a recent cruise and also at home. After I viewed hot roller tutorials and experimented a little, I found what works for me - everyone's different! I use a little mousse before drying my hair and a very small amount of argan oil on the ends, then spray lightly my hair with hair spray after removing the rollers.
customer_reviews.author: LongIslandGal

customer_reviews.title: Great little set, but won't be a miracle for hair that doesn't hold curl
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact it is, but I wish there were just two more rollers! But I have super thick hair so that's probably not going to be a problem for most people. I have super straight hair that does not hold curl very well, so this is not a miracle product by any means. A curling iron or some other higher-heat tool is obviously going to work better. But I use these mostly to provide volume or to prep my hair for an updo and they work great for that. I have not traveled internationally with them yet but I will update my review then.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A Ringstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great little set!
customer_reviews.text: After trying a couple of hot roller sets, I am finding these are perfect for me. The size is wonderful for travel. I have fine, 65 year old hair, so I don't need any more than the 10 rollers in the set. They get hot, so I take out a couple at a time and let them cool a little. I have clamps left over from another set and I use either the clamps or the pins provided for holding them in place, depending on what will work best. They're rubbery and grippy, no sliding out of my hair. I recommend them over some much pricier sets I tried. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Markey

customer_reviews.title: Cute hair easy travel
customer_reviews.text: This little set is perfect for travel. I like to curl my hair on days I don’t wash it. I just took this on a trip and it was very compact and easy to pack. I thought I would have to roll in 2 sections but this was enough to just roll all my hair at once. It gave great curl. One thing I learned is just make sure rollers are pushed all the way down on the heating element before you turn it on, I didn’t realize this the first time I used it and wondered why a couple of rollers were hot and the rest were not .
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These hot curlers work great! The direction say you can use in 90 seconds, but I would wait at least 3 minutes. They stay in the package, and I love the compactness. Read instructions carefully regarding the seating of the rollers, as it is a little different than the typical hot rollers. Very pleased with results. No on or off switch, so you have to unplug when finished. These will be great for travel too.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: These actually really do a GREAT job. In fact, I might just replace my old, non-portable set with these. Thing is... I didn't think they were going to work when I got them. I thought I had been sent a bum set. When you get them, be sure that all of the rollers are pushed down onto the elements. This might sound like a given but I figured they would be sent that way and they weren't. When they are pushed down, they heat up HOT and QUICK. And they work great! Wonderful set... Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Beth Martin

customer_reviews.title: Rollers and clips do not leave odd kinks in ones hair like other types of clips and rollers do
customer_reviews.text: I love this roller kit perfect for travel/every day, compact and easy to store and the rollers and clips do not leave odd kinks in ones hair like other types of clips and rollers do. However, I had to take off a star since they changed the clips from the original design. I really wish they would go back to the old design of the old clips as these clips do not hold like the old design of the original clips. The clips in the picture are the old clip design, but that is not what is in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Clips are a problem
customer_reviews.text: Before buying , I read a review comment that the clips didn't work. Remington replied they had fixed the problem. But I don't think they did....the clips flew off, dropping a hot roller on my neck. I tried for two weeks then gave up and went back to my previous hot rollers. They did heat well....so well the bathroom mirror steamed near them!
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Super Impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little set of hot rollers!! Perfect size rollers for my long, bra strap length hair! I use the smaller size for the underneath and the bigger rollers for the top. The clips are great too!! They really hold the roller in place! They heat up quick and make perfect curls!! This is by far the best hot rollers I've ever had! Way better than expensive ones I had before this. Love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andilivoti

customer_reviews.title: Minimal and irregular heat after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact size of the case and the smallness of the rollers, which is what I need for my older, shorter, thinner hair. However -- after using it a couple of times, I used it again today for first time in a month and there was very low heat and the heat seemed irregular between the 2 sizes. And -- that was after several minutes. Return window is closed, but I'm going to order another one in hopes that it won't be a lemon. Low risk at $15, but annoying that the first one started acting up so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Word Lover

customer_reviews.title: Buy Another Brand
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a waste of money. I wanted a lightweight curling set to supplement my larger rollers for travel. The Remington rollers are lightweight, but too small. The diameter refers to the larger ends of the curler, not the curler diameter. The set takes a long time to heat up to only a warm temperature. Conair is a much better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mahalo

customer_reviews.title: All I Need for Style. AuntyPasto says 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Compact for travel ✅ Easy on the scalp ✅ Quick to heat up✅ These are perfect and I only need to leave them in for 5-15’ spray a little Dry Wax and I’m happy with my volume and style! I am working with double process bleached Silver Ice Hair and blackish roots. Lovin’ it!
customer_reviews.author: Aunty Pasto

customer_reviews.title: this set DOES WORK DIRECTLY WITH 220 electricity
customer_reviews.text: Took a trip to Peru. In one home it had the typical Peruvian outlet...rounded terminals, along with "american" like outlets, both connected to 220 electricity. I was able to plug the curlers directly into the "american" like outlets and they heated up great. Then I went to another place that only had the Peruvian rounded outlets. Used an adaptor and they heated up fine. The curlers are smaller than what I typically use. I bought two sets, put larger ones in one and smaller ones in other...they all fit either way. These curlers are lightweight and take up little space in the suitcase. I would ask the manufacturer to make 1 1/2" curlers for travel....for us longer haired people!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact curlers
customer_reviews.text: I needed an easy way to style my hair and these do the trick perfectly. I originally purchase the conair compact curlers, but they didn't work that well. After using these remington ones with a friend, I purchased these instead. They heat up quickly and create a nice, lasting curl. They also give good volume as well.
customer_reviews.author: KCS

customer_reviews.title: Warm rollers
customer_reviews.text: These don’t get very warm. Plus one of the rollers didn’t sit flush with the base so it never warmed up. I had to hold it down with something heavy to get it to stay down. But even then they didn’t get warm enough. I ended up throwing them out. Even though they’re the perfect traveling size it was easier to bring a curling iron that actually got hot.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good Roller, Horrible Clips.
customer_reviews.text: While the actual rollers were fine, not too hot to touch and a great compact case, the metal clips are awful. They simply do not stay on the roller. Repeatedly falling out making it impossible to use. If you want to spend more money to buy the claw type of roller clips then this would probably be a good little set. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: MEM63

customer_reviews.title: Best curlers - really!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years and years. This might be my fourth set. Glad I found on Amazon. I have thick long hair and only leave them in about a minute. Hair ends up being not too curly and the flyaways are tamed. The only issue is the hairpins, the tips come off and I buy a new set just for them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these rollers for a trip to France. I didn't expect these rollers to do as good of a job as my full size set of rollers but they did what I needed them to do which was to put a nice wave to my hair and smooth the frizzles. I was glad I did purchase the set and will use them again on future travels.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Not as hot as they should be
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 other similar sets by Remington over the years. I travel a lot so they don't last me as long as they normally would. This set does not get nearly as hot as the other two sets I have owned. I've let it heat up for nearly an hour, let me hair stay rolled until they are completely cool and I only get a wave, not a typical heat curl.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Jent

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: The rollers themselves worked great. As long as you make sure that they are seated completely on the base, they heat fairly quickly. The clips however were terrible. The clips are not made to fit the rollers and slowly work themselves away until they eventually shoot off the roller and you have to crawl around on the floor to find them. It was very frustrating. I am going to look for clips that fit and keep them because they are dual voltage and worked great in Ireland with an adapter. You do not need a voltage converter to use these, only a plug adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine17

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I was losing an old friend when they finally ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a replacement set. The last set I had for 15 years and used them several times a week. I felt like I was losing an old friend when they finally wore out. They are great! I was really pleased that I could get the same set again. I like that they are small and portable, but there are enough curlers that I can still curl all of my hair which is past shoulder length. My old ones were all one color, I like that these are color coded by size. I also like that there are no teeth that get caught up in my hair like some sets of curlers.
customer_reviews.author: DJR

customer_reviews.title: Great, compact, perfect for home or travel.
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these sets of hot curlers for years, but finally needed to update. I use them every day, but they are perfect for travel because they are compact and come in their own case. Heat up very fast which is a big plus. Nice new style clips to hold the rollers in your hair. Easy travel overseas by using a converter. Very happy and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: anniez

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were less expensive than the brand I had been using. You get what you pay for... these didn't heat up properly and they don't stay in my fine but plentiful hair. Oh well, will keep as an extra which is why I won't give it only one star....
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: These had great reviews so I really wanted to love them- plus they come with the pins and not the clips so huge bonus. I heated them up for at least 10 minutes and they were warm but I could squeeze the roller in my hand and not have a problem. My hair is long, straight, and thick. These “waved” my hair sort of, but it dropped completely within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats well, small and compact
customer_reviews.text: Have been using hot curlers for years and years - these are my favorite, small enough for travel, fits on the bathroom sink, heats quickly. But do wish they would sell replacement pins, I swear I don't know how I lose them and/or the rubber tip falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Best electric curlers I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my travel curlers that died. That set had 5 curlers and this has 10 but takes the same amount of space. As it turns out these are better than any electric curlers I have ever had. The curl stays in for 3 days until I wash my hair. And the curl isn't too tight but rather soft. When my curlers at home die I will buy these to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. P. Heim

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy in Heated Rollers!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Good Product. Lightweight with endcaps that remain cool so your fingers don't get burnt. They are comfortable to wear, and I am very pleased with these rollers/ Having tried other manufacturers rollers I had almost given up on the idea of using rollers. I have very fine hair and I am satisfied with the results I get from using these. I have never been disappointed with Remington products.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Bale-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Portable hot rollers for travel
customer_reviews.text: I like but not love these rollers. They just don't heat fast enough for me though, takes about 10 minutes. They pack well and don't take up too much space and are lightweight as well. Overall they worked well for my needs and are kind to my hair. They didn't pull or cause tangles.
customer_reviews.author: Superbean

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for these but sadly they didn't work. Only about half the rollers heated. Even the ones that did, didn't do a great job curling my hair (and my hair curls very easily). I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: MamaW

customer_reviews.title: Great compact hot roller for traveling
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for a lightweight, compact hot roller set for travel, you've found the one! Never had a problem with the heating or my hair not curling. I usually plug the rollers in, walk away and do my make up, then come back 10 mins later and roll my hair. I also like that this set comes with pins vs clips. I've used both types but like how seamless the pins are in my thick hair. If you have thin fine or super straight hair, maybe the clips might work better. Well worth the time and convenience when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sy

customer_reviews.title: Light for packing
customer_reviews.text: These are well designed for convenience and travel, being so light. The pins to secure them are perfect and work better than most other brands. The rollers don't slip; for the price they're excellent and I recommend them for short to medium length hair. If Remington made slightly larger travel ones I'd buy them too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: What I liked was the price and the size. What I didn't like were the stupid clips that came with the rollers that kept popping out. I agree that you should buy better clips if you get this set. The rollers are a little hard to fit back in the slot.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: A repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these and my teen girls keep snagging mine. So I purchased this for them, so I can get mine back. I’ve always found it works well and I really like the size. It doesn’t take up much space like the old school hot rollers can. Also any time I have to travel these compact rollers pack nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: I bought it again
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the size is small for the amount of hair I have but this product is awesome. It does the job, is convenient for travelers, love the pins and heats up very fast. Love it! I bought the second one to cover my whole hair but for traveling I only need one for my lower leyers.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita R Dismukes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Remington roller set I've used over the past 20 years or so, and it's by far the best. Super fast heating time; comfortable roller feel, weight, and grip; and the best roller clips I've ever used (they stay put remarkably well in my frustratingly fine, shoulder-length hair). Impressive quality and value. Approx 3 months daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Prolific Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. nice loose curls on my medium length hair. The quality of the curler is good, however the heated dock is a flimsy plastic. The docking pegs the curlers set on for heating is not sturdy. I will keep, not worth the time or trouble to return it. I will look for a better heat roller set.
customer_reviews.author: guidedog Mom

customer_reviews.title: I never leave home without my Remington Compact Ceramic Worldwide Voltage Hair Setter, Hair Rollers
customer_reviews.text: After having tried several different brands, I believe The Remington Rollers are the best dual voltage hot rollers sold. They give your hair a beautiful long lasting curl. I have used these rollers in 6 different countries. They are so compact that they take up very little space in your luggage, and as the case doesn’t get hot you can pack them immediately after removing from your hair. I use a set daily at home and keep another set in my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: PatriciaSK

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a compact set that really gets hot enough.
customer_reviews.text: They heat up great. These are very good on my fine hair. Nothing curls it but these give it body and waves. Don't use the clips that come with them. I use Conair multi-purpose clips (claws). You can get them on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by the staying power of the curls you get from these hot rollers. Easy to use, and got lots of compliments on my hair! I have fine hair so volume is often hard to obtain. These put more volume in than I could have ever hoped for and stayed almost all day long with the help of a little hairspray.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Vines

customer_reviews.title: Work well but not enough for my hair.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, portable hot rollers. I like the small case and they curl my hair well. The only problem is my hair is just past my shoulders and there are not enough of them !!! I can’t possibly get all of my hair into them. I might buy another set with larger rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Far smaller than I would have liked, but I suppose that part is my fault
customer_reviews.text: Far smaller than I would have liked, but I suppose that part is my fault. My main issue is that they do not get hot enough and the clips you get with them are tiny flimsy things and not good with anyone with any normal amount of hair who doesnt want to spend a hour moving curlers around your head trying to get small sections of hair. Far better curlers out there for just a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Handy for travel and soft curls, but only 10 rollers.
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are easy to use, compact and great for travel. They heat up quick, However I don’t think they get hot enough and I think they cool down too quick to curl my hair even with mousse on my hair. Also, there are only 10 large rollers and were not enough for my long hair and with larger rollers only provided a soft curl. I decided to return them because I wanted more curl, needed more rollers and did not need them for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly32

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get very hot
customer_reviews.text: They are fine in a pinch, but the end rollers don't get very hot. I have thin hair so I only need a few rollers, but if you needed to use all of the rollers at one time it wouldn't be good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: The rollers are impossible to work with. They won't stay in and the pins keep popping out. My hair is very thick and curly - the rollers are probably too small for hair like mine. They might be ok with thinner hair. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Light and effective
customer_reviews.text: Wow this little package of curlers delivers! I couldn’t believe how compact and light they are and wasn’t convinced they would do the trick. I usually use 14 curlers to set my hair. This travel set did it in 10 and it looks better than my regular hot rollers. Bought it for travel but good enough to use every day—except it was slow to heat up. My only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F. Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, heats quickly
customer_reviews.text: I use these mainly for height on the top of my head, not for overall curl. They heat up fairly quickly, easy to use, even for someone who hasn’t used hot rollers in years! Gives a nice gentle curl. I’m very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B Kime

customer_reviews.title: a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I returned another brand's travel rollers which didn't heat well or work and ordered these. They are wonderful. They do take longer than 2 minutes to heat up....maybe 4 or 5 minutes, but once they do...they are great. They give you a great curl and you can do a great style. They are compact and easy to pack. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Jet Above Clouds

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have long very thick hair .I got these today and they did a great job giving me waves and I had enough rollers.I am happy with the set and will be great to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Travel Size
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to replace my regular old school Conair felt covered hot rollers. Not exactly the same but I needed something more compact. Actually—I need five jumbo hot rollers in a small simple case. Simple but not easy to find. These rollers work. Not as good as my jumbo, but they work. Just don’t leave them in too long.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Ross

customer_reviews.title: Takes awhile to heat curlers
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair, and don't need a lot of heat. These curlers take about 15 min. to get hot enough to curl my hair. I purchased 2 sets because I use 20 rollers. For international travel, I use just one base. I remove the base from the other case (it slips out easily), and use the 2nd case just for the spare rollers. As I use a roller from the base, I replace with a spare. By the time I use the first 10 rollers, the others are almost hot enough. These two compact cases can be tucked into small spaces in your luggage and don't take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well and I have no complaints except that I wish that there were more because I have so much dang hair. I do feel like they don't get quite as warmed as other hot rollers that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Henley

customer_reviews.title: Best rollers!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These are the best rollers. They leave your hair soft, frizz free and very curly. I have naturally straight hair.....like a board and the curl lasts all night even after I sleep on it. The only negative I can say is that it does take a couple minutes to heat up but watch out when they do! I would recommend these rollers
customer_reviews.author: J Jenness

customer_reviews.title: They don’t work well
customer_reviews.text: The larger rollers do not heat up barely at all. The smallest ones do, but you’d probably be better off with a more expensive set. I should have listened to the other reviews about this product.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: The pins ruin the product
customer_reviews.text: The pins are horrible. They FLY out of your hair. The rollers heat up and curl great but...... the pins are so frustrating!! I have tried using other pins but haven’t had much success. Clipped grippers work but take up so much room. For this reason I would not purchase these roller again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact set
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact case. Does take a little longer than it claims to really heat up but I plug them in while I blow dry my hair and they are ready when I'm done. Must make sure each curler is pressed down into the unit. I take them out after a few minutes and my hair stays curly all day. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hampton

customer_reviews.title: These little rollers do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick should-length hair and a little worried that these rollers ( which are a lot smaller than my usual rollers) would give me a good style. Well, they heated very fast and gave great curls! Since the roller is so small, the curls are tighter, so, just let it fall and your hair will look great. Took these rollers to Paris and had no issues with the dual electricity voltage.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel rollers- for home and abroad!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick hair that looks absolutely terrible when it's not styled. These rollers are the best travel set I've encountered! They are compact, get hot enough, and work well with adapters overseas because they're designed for travel (I've fried several sets of my favorite rollers, even with the appropriate adapters). Some reviewers mention that the clips that come with the set are not the best and that the rollers fell out of their hair. I did purchase longer ones from the beauty supply store ($2-3) and that took care of the issue. I LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice little travel curlers
customer_reviews.text: Great curler set for travel. They get hot fast and are easy to use. The clips are brilliant - one side is longer than the other, which is a small feature that makes a big difference. I'm thinking of getting another set so I can just keep these in my bag all the time!
customer_reviews.author: LCCruns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, lightweight product with fantastic CS!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the curlers are in a soft, compact case. I have purchased sets for our two homes and for friends over the years. For the first time, a set stopped working. I called the Remington phone number and the representative quickly and without issue arranged to mail me a replacement set, along with a prepaid return label to mail them the defective set. Excellent customer service can be rare these days and it’s wondrrful to know it still exists! Ty, Remington!
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: BEST I'VE HAD...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new set of dual voltage travel rollers. Just tried these, and they are GREAT. Nice overall size case, good size rollers for me. Lightweight overall. The "J" shape clips are a huge improvement over the old "U" shaped clips. They heat up quickly, but as well, they cool down quickly, so you don't have to wait 20 minutes for them to cool to remove them, which for my fine, thick hair, causes the curl to straighten rapidly. I highly recommend. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The rollers heated up very unevenly - some too hot to handle and others lukewarm. I have curly hair and they were ineffective in making my hair less kinky. I don't recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Christa R

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was very easy to use. I didn’t not like the small diameters of the rods as I have length in hair. I’m looking for BIG rods say 5 in diameter. I also was disappointed they don’t curl hair more than 5 minutes. Don’t get hot. Kinda lukewarm??
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McGunn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible purchase. Firstly, these rollers do not work with the outlets in either of my bathrooms. This is really strange, as I’ve never had an issue with using blow dryers, curling irons, or any other electrical device with either outlet. I have to heat the rollers in my office (for some bizarre reason, they get an electrical current in there) and hope I can get them in before they cool. Secondly, if you have even moderately thick hair, as I do, there’s just not enough rollers. I will be returning these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hal

customer_reviews.title: Rollers are heated in 90 Seconds and are a very good product
customer_reviews.text: I did not rate “Drying Power” since curlers are not meant for use in wet hair. Rollers heat in 90 seconds! The curl produced from these rollers is nice and long lasting . It holds all day and leaves hair with fullness and body for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Creegan

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: It's a 5-star product with 1-2 star metal hair clips. The clips don't hold to the hair and the rollers continuously fall out. Remington used to sell this product with snap over plastic clips. I saved the clips from the older rollers that finally fell apart after years of good service. Plastic spring clips are available on Amazon. Great for home or travel. Buy the product, toss the metal clips, and use plastic spring loaded clips.
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and successful
customer_reviews.text: My second set. They last for a really long time. I use them every week. Now I can use all big rollers if I use rollers from the old set and the new set. Super great because I don't have to stand and hold the curling iron. I did have to get a clips that were different like a clam claw Clips at a beauty supply store so they would stay in better.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Peck

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: I love how quick these rollers work. I let them heat up for 3 minutes then let them sit for 5 min. Not bad results at all. I definitely will use again. Never used rollers before, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Mika H.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These work really well, and they were very compact for my suitcase. My hair is pretty fine, and shoulder length, and there are just enough for me, so people with long or thick hair would probably need more than one pack. But the curls really last and they were easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joonuper

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Compact and light weight- great for travel. Dual voltage. Takes a while to get used to but product works. I Got additional roller clips as they are easier to use than the j clip it comes with
customer_reviews.author: DVB Soriano

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel - glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Love these - used them on a recent cruise and they worked perfectly. I did order two sets because is was cheaper than buying extra rollers. I combined all the larger rollers into the one I took on vacation (have longer hair) and they worked just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I find this a great little set to use everyday or for travel. I have long hair and usually place my hair in a ponytail on top of my head and then section it and use the curlers that way --so I never need more than what this travel set provides even for daily use. And it packs nice in a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Morriganne

customer_reviews.title: ... you get the hang of it this set is amazing! I have VERY straight hair
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while to get used to the pins but once you get the hang of it this set is amazing! I have VERY straight hair, it takes forever to curl my hair with a curler, and lots of hairspray. With these I plug them in wait 5 mins, spray sea salt spray in my hair and sit with them in for maybe 20 mins and the curls come out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and no weird roller gap!
customer_reviews.text: I keep these with my travel bag and I'm obsessed with them! They heat up quick enough and the best part is the rollers don't have that gap in them I've been noticing with other sets which can leave a crease if you're not careful. They definitely get the job done when I'm on the road!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Not enough pieces of curlers
customer_reviews.text: It makes my hair curly, easy to use, but I would need a full second set of these to have my hair done. I have shoulder length hair, strong, but not extremely lot. So, if you are looking for a fast solution to create curls stick to your flatiron.
customer_reviews.author: Orsi_G

product_meta.title: Remington H1016 Compact Ceramic Worldwide Voltage Hair Setter, Hair Rollers, 1-1 ¼ Inch, Purple/Black
product_meta.description:
Create large and medium curls with less frizz*; It’s easy with America’s #1 Setter Brand**; The REMINGTON Compact Roller Set is the perfect size for easy storage and features worldwide voltage for traveling. You get 10 rollers in two different sizes, (5 Large 1¼” and 5 Medium 1”), that heat up in 90 seconds and will create long lasting volume and curls. The exclusive J-clips are color coded to coordinate with the roller sizes. These j-clips have been specially designed to provide your roller with a better hold with less creasing*. The rollers feature Ionic + Ceramic technology to reduce static and frizz*, leaving you with a healthy looking shine; Do not reach for an appliance that has fallen into water. Unplug it immediately

*vs. standard Remington setter and clips

**Nielsen 52 weeks, Dollars & Units, ending April, 2018.
feature_bullets: Compact Hot Rollers for Easy Storage & Travel
Ionic + Ceramic for Less Frizz & More Shine; 10 Rollers in 2 Size: 5 Large (1¼ inch), 5 Medium (1inch)
Exclusive J Clip for Better Hold & Less Creasing
These heated rollers are designed to work on ordinary household current only; They are not intended for commercial use
Worldwide Voltage; Refer to the PDF attached below in Technical Specification for User Manual. Assembled Product Dimensions (L x W x H) 7.00 x 2.90 x 3.50 Inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
